sentence.Network_en: The treaty is subject to ratification.
sentence.Network_cn: 此条约经批准后才能生效.

sentence.Network_en: Opinion polls indicated a two - thirds majority in favour of ratification of the treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 民意调查表明2/3的多数票赞成批准这个条约.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...般是单方面的（unilateral）声明（statement）。保留条款必须在签约（signing）或批准（ratification）的时候提出。在加入条约（join）后任何一方不得提出保留条款。
ratification 批准ratification 认可ratifier 批准者
(一) 追认(ratification)27 (二) 英美法上的“禁反言”(estoppel)规则27-28  (三) 出票伪造由被伪造人的过失行为引起28-29  (四) 银行.

“条约批准”(treaty ratification)，是指国家或以“接受”(acceptance)表示同意受条约拘束，或以“核准”(approval）、.

entry.def: The ratification of a treaty or written agreement is the process of ratifying it.

example.ex: The EU will now complete ratification of the treaty by June 1.
example.tran: 欧盟将于6月1日前完成条约的批准。

means.word_mean: 1. making something valid by formally ratifying or confirming it;
